word: 12-14 (Revelation 11:19; 14:9-12). Sabbathkeepers Repair the Breach.-- [Isaiah 58:8-14 quoted.] Where do we find the people who are thus addressed? Who is it that shall build the old waste places, and raise up the foundation of many generations? Where are the people who have had light from heaven to see that a breach has been made in the law of God?
